1354790.name: Coloring Game 3 - Art Museum
1354790.description:
The second DLC to the Coloring Game 3. Contains large highly-detailed images.
The completion of all the levels takes approximately 40 hours (10 images / 1,500,000px).

Theme: artworks
Size: 10 images / 1,500,000px
Duration: 40 hours

Please note that the Art Museum is not going to feature animation for completed images. The majority of images represent highly dynamic scenes, while the animation of eyes and other small parts of the images has failed to produce positive results. That is why we have decided to make an exception and not to add animation to this DLC. I hope for the players’ understanding on this matter.
1354790.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 保加利亚语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 匈牙利语, 越南语, 希腊语, 丹麦语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 繁体中文, 简体中文, 韩语, 荷兰语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 泰语, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 芬兰语, 捷克语, 瑞典语, 日语
